title: Mou Manzoku desho!?
description:
From Tadanohito:
This set of one-shots are pretty vanilla, nearly all with humor in them. There is such a variety of settings, viewpoints, motivations and character types and plots that I can't cover them all. Overall this is a fun set of stories that shows just how enjoyable ero-manga can be. This book is also known as

1. Manman Muboubi Binbin (Hot, Vulnerable and Hard)
2. Nago chan Maji de!? (Are You Serious, Nago-chan!?)
3. Momoe san to!! (With Momoe-san!!)
4. SUKE SUKE YUME SAN (See-through Yume-san)
5. Houkago no Kankei (After-school Kind of Relationship)
6. Miss.Yakumaru's dog
7. Attakai Hito。 (Warm-Hearted Girl)
8. Shiroi Koibito (Milky White Lover)
9. Ano Hito wo Souhi Nagara (While Thinking of You)
10. Ame no Hi no Ashioto (Footsteps on a Rainy Day)
11. Yanagida-ka no Nichijou (Daily Life In The Yanagida Household)
